ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Irish stout beer
des: "Drop a 'bomb' of Irish whiskey into a glass of stout beer and get ready for a wild evening."
ins: Pour Irish stout beer into a beer mug. Fill a shot glass with Irish whiskey. Drop the shot glass full of whiskey into the beer mug and let it sink to the bottom. Drink it entirely in one gulp, being careful not to swallow the shot glass.
